newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Death toll 38 Arabs, 11 Israelis at 1530 gmt.
newsitem.headline: Death toll 38 Arabs, 11 Israelis at 1530 gmt.

text.p: Israeli troops shot dead 33 Palestinians in clashes on Thursday and Palestinian forces killed 11 Israelis, Palestinian medical sources and Israel Radio said.

The Palestinian sources said 21 Palestinians were killed in the Gaza Strip and 12 in the West Bank. The radio said 11 Israelis were killed in the clashes on Thursday. The death toll from two days of violence is 38 Palestinians and 11 Israelis.
